properties.displayName: MCSB Baseline item PA-7 for Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS)

features.featureDescription: Azure Role-Based Access Control (Azure RBAC) can be used to managed access to service's data plane actions.
features.featureGuidance: Use Azure role-based access control (Azure RBAC) to manage Azure resource access through built-in role assignments. Azure RBAC roles can be assigned to users, groups, service principals, and managed identities.
features.customerActionsDescription: Follow just enough administration (least privilege) principle

automatedPolicyAvailability.policyName: Azure Role-Based Access Control (RBAC) should be used on Kubernetes Services
automatedPolicyAvailability.policyDescription: To provide granular filtering on the actions that users can perform, use Azure Role-Based Access Control (RBAC) to manage permissions in Kubernetes Service Clusters and configure relevant authorization policies.
